children.subject: Just curious, who's the guest commencement speaker this year?

history.content:
Dear Students,

If you are a graduating CS student and will be participating in the commencement do you want to be one of the student speakers? Do you have some special moments you want to share with your fellow Covid years cohort? Do you have some unique wisdom you want to impart to others? Do you want to say a special thank you to Prof Hilfinger? Then consider being a student speaker.

What: Auditions will be held remotely via a zoom link. You will present a 2-4 minute speech during our auditions (please don't send videos)
When: May 5th Thurs 5/5 2-3:30pm. 

for 10 minute appointment slots.  A Zoom link will be sent after you sign up with more information.  Please do not sign up unless you are sure you will be auditioning, slots are limited. If slots are full send email to carolmarshall@berkeley.edu  and I will start a wait list

history.subject: Announcing LS CS Commencement Student Speaker auditions coming up next week (updated!)

history.content: Dear Students, If you are graduating and will be participating in the commencement do you want to be one of the student speakers? Do you have some special moments you want to share with your fellow Covid years cohort? Do you have some unique wisdom you want to impart to others? Do you want to say a special thank you to Prof Hilfinger? Then consider being a student speaker. What: Auditions will be held remotely via a zoom link. You will present a 2-4 minute speech during our auditions (please don't send videos) When: Probably Thurs 5/5 in the afternoon. Most likely between 2-3:30pm We will finalize the time early next week and I will update this post. I will post a sign up sheet with appointment periods. More information to come, Sorry to be vague about time but we are finalizing scheduling. Hope to see you there.
history.subject: Announcing LS CS Commencement Student Speaker auditions coming up next week!
